Field Label: The next questions are about firearms. We are asking these in a health survey because of our interest in firearm-related injuries. Please include weapons such as pistols, shotguns, and rifles but not BB guns, starter pistols, or guns that cannot fire. Include those kept in a garage, outdoor storage area, or motor vehicle.
Are any firearms kept in or around your home?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Yes | 2, No [go to closing statement] | 7, Don't know/Not sure [go to closing statement] | 9, Refused [go to closing statement]

Field Label: Are any of these firearms now loaded?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Yes | 2, No [go to closing statement] | 7, Don't know/Not sure [go to closing statement] | 9, Refused [go to closing statement]

Field Label: Are any of these loaded firearms also unlocked? By unlocked, we mean you do not need a key or combination to get the gun or to fire it. We don't count a safety as a lock.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Yes | 2, No | 7, Don't know/Not sure | 9, Refused

Field Label:
Closing statement

Please read:

That's my last question. Everyone's answers will be combined to give us information about the health practices of people in this state. Thank you very much for your time and cooperation.
